chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall alpha : Ordinal, successor_ordinal alpha \/ limit_ordinal alpha

Premises:
Inductive limit_ordinal : Ordinal -> Prop := intro_limit_ord : forall (I : Type) (alpha : I -> Ordinal), (forall i : I, exists j : I, alpha i < alpha j) -> limit_ordinal (ord_sup alpha) | limit_ord_wd : forall alpha beta : Ordinal, limit_ordinal alpha -> alpha == beta -> limit_ordinal beta Arguments intro_limit_ord {I}%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope
Inductive successor_ordinal : Ordinal -> Prop := intro_succ_ord : forall alpha : Ordinal, successor_ordinal (ordS alpha) | succ_ord_wd : forall alpha beta : Ordinal, successor_ordinal alpha -> alpha == beta -> successor_ordinal beta
Inductive Ordinal : Type := ordS : Ordinal -> Ordinal | ord_sup : forall I : Type, (I -> Ordinal) -> Ordinal Arguments ord_sup {I}%type_scope _%function_scope
succ_ord_wd : forall alpha beta : Ordinal, successor_ordinal alpha -> alpha == beta -> successor_ordinal beta
limit_ord_wd : forall alpha beta : Ordinal, limit_ordinal alpha -> alpha == beta -> limit_ordinal beta
successor_ordinal_ind : forall P : Ordinal -> Prop, (forall alpha : Ordinal, P (ordS alpha)) -> (forall alpha beta : Ordinal, successor_ordinal alpha -> P alpha -> alpha == beta -> P beta) -> forall o : Ordinal, successor_ordinal o -> P o
successor_ordinal_sind : forall P : Ordinal -> SProp, (forall alpha : Ordinal, P (ordS alpha)) -> (forall alpha beta : Ordinal, successor_ordinal alpha -> P alpha -> alpha == beta -> P beta) -> forall o : Ordinal, successor_ordinal o -> P o
ord_total_order : forall alpha beta : Ordinal, alpha < beta \/ alpha == beta \/ alpha > beta
limit_ordinal_ind : forall P : Ordinal -> Prop, (forall (I : Type) (alpha : I -> Ordinal), (forall i : I, exists j : I, alpha i < alpha j) -> P (ord_sup alpha)) -> (forall alpha beta : Ordinal, limit_ordinal alpha -> P alpha -> alpha == beta -> P beta) -> forall o : Ordinal, limit_ordinal o -> P o
limit_ordinal_sind : forall P : Ordinal -> SProp, (forall (I : Type) (alpha : I -> Ordinal), (forall i : I, exists j : I, alpha i < alpha j) -> P (ord_sup alpha)) -> (forall alpha beta : Ordinal, limit_ordinal alpha -> P alpha -> alpha == beta -> P beta) -> forall o : Ordinal, limit_ordinal o -> P o
intro_succ_ord : forall alpha : Ordinal, successor_ordinal (ordS alpha)
intro_limit_ord : forall alpha : ?I -> Ordinal, (forall i : ?I, exists j : ?I, alpha i < alpha j) -> limit_ordinal (ord_sup alpha) where ?I : [ |- Type]
ord_le_refl : forall alpha : Ordinal, alpha <= alpha
ord_le_S : forall alpha : Ordinal, alpha <= ordS alpha
ord_lt_irrefl : forall alpha : Ordinal, ~ alpha < alpha
ord_lt_le : forall alpha beta : Ordinal, alpha < beta -> alpha <= beta
ord_le_respects_succ : forall alpha beta : Ordinal, alpha <= beta -> ordS alpha <= ordS beta
ord_le_respects_succ_converse : forall alpha beta : Ordinal, ordS alpha <= ordS beta -> alpha <= beta
ord_lt_respects_succ : forall alpha beta : Ordinal, alpha < beta -> ordS alpha < ordS beta
ord_le_lt_trans : forall alpha beta gamma : Ordinal, alpha <= beta -> beta < gamma -> alpha < gamma
ord_lt_trans : forall alpha beta gamma : Ordinal, alpha < beta -> beta < gamma -> alpha < gamma
ord_le_trans : forall alpha beta gamma : Ordinal, alpha <= beta -> beta <= gamma -> alpha <= gamma
ord_lt_le_trans : forall alpha beta gamma : Ordinal, alpha < beta -> beta <= gamma -> alpha < gamma
Inductive ord_le : Ordinal -> Ordinal -> Prop := ord_le_respects_succ : forall alpha beta : Ordinal, alpha <= beta -> ordS alpha <= ordS beta | ord_le_S_sup : forall (alpha : Ordinal) (J : Type) (beta : J -> Ordinal) (j : J), ordS alpha <= beta j -> ordS alpha <= ord_sup beta | ord_sup_minimal : forall (I : Type) (alpha : I -> Ordinal) (beta : Ordinal), (forall i : I, alpha i <= beta) -> ord_sup alpha <= beta Arguments ord_le_S_sup _ _%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments ord_sup_minimal _%type_scope _%function_scope _ _%function_scope
ord_le_sind : forall P : Ordinal -> Ordinal -> SProp, (forall alpha beta : Ordinal, alpha <= beta -> P alpha beta -> P (ordS alpha) (ordS beta)) -> (forall (alpha : Ordinal) (J : Type) (beta : J -> Ordinal) (j : J), ordS alpha <= beta j -> P (ordS alpha) (beta j) -> P (ordS alpha) (ord_sup beta)) -> (forall (I : Type) (alpha : I -> Ordinal) (beta : Ordinal), (forall i : I, alpha i <= beta) -> (forall i : I, P (alpha i) beta) -> P (ord_sup alpha) beta) -> forall o o0 : Ordinal, o <= o0 -> P o o0
ord_le_ind : forall P : Ordinal -> Ordinal -> Prop, (forall alpha beta : Ordinal, alpha <= beta -> P alpha beta -> P (ordS alpha) (ordS beta)) -> (forall (alpha : Ordinal) (J : Type) (beta : J -> Ordinal) (j : J), ordS alpha <= beta j -> P (ordS alpha) (beta j) -> P (ordS alpha) (ord_sup beta)) -> (forall (I : Type) (alpha : I -> Ordinal) (beta : Ordinal), (forall i : I, alpha i <= beta) -> (forall i : I, P (alpha i) beta) -> P (ord_sup alpha) beta) -> forall o o0 : Ordinal, o <= o0 -> P o o0
ord_le_sup : forall (I : Type) (alpha : I -> Ordinal) (i : I), alpha i <= ord_sup alpha
ord_sup_minimal_converse : forall (I : Type) (alpha : I -> Ordinal) (beta : Ordinal), ord_sup alpha <= beta -> forall i : I, alpha i <= beta

```coq
intros alpha.
induction alpha using ord_le_ind.
- right. apply intro_limit_ord. intros i. exists i. apply ord_le_refl.
- destruct IHalpha as [succ_alpha | lim_alpha].
  + left. apply succ_ord_wd with (ordS alpha). assumption. apply ord_le_respects_succ. assumption.
  + right. apply limit_ord_wd with (ord_sup (fun _ : unit => alpha)). assumption. apply ord_sup_minimal. intros i. apply ord_le_refl.
Qed.```

original: intros alpha. induction alpha using ord_le_ind. - right. apply intro_limit_ord. intros i. exists i. apply ord_le_refl. - destruct IHalpha as [succ_alpha | lim_alpha]. + left. apply succ_ord_wd with (ordS alpha). auto. apply ord_le_respects_succ. auto. + right. apply limit_ord_wd with (ord_sup (fun _ : unit => alpha)). auto. apply ord_sup_minimal. intros i. apply ord_le_refl.
